name: CHANGE: A Homeless Survival Experience
description: CHANGE is an emotional homeless survival experience set in a randomly generated city with rogue-like elements. Explore, survive, earn perks, find items and more to develop your character and escape to a new life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space
